div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1358 Karacabey (formerly Mihaliç; anc. (694) Miletopolis?), Mysia, 1929 Burial: c. 75 B.C. Contents: 271 AR Cistophori Pergamum: 114 Ephesus: 17 (to yr. 56) Nysa: 2 Tralles: 90 (to yr. 9) Apameia: 47 Laodiceia: 1 Disposition: Istanbul Regling, Frankfurter Münzzeitung 1932, pp. 506-10 To be published by F. Kleiner
